And it shall be, if <S%H518><s%> you have no <S%H3808><s%> delight <S%H2654><s%> in her, then you shall let her go <S%H7971><s%> where she will; <S%H5315><s%> but you shall not sell <S%H4376><s%> her at all <S%H3605><s%> for money, <S%H3701><s%> you shall not make <S%H6014><s%> merchandise <S%H6014><s%> of her, because <S%H8478><s%> <S%H834><s%> you have humbled <S%H6031><s%> her.
